content: Julien Baste Julien Baste MaÃ®tre de confÃ©rences (associate professor) in UniversitÃ© de Lille email : julien.baste (at) univ-lille.fr Teaching at IUT de Lille Office: 3A47 Tel: +33  3 59 63 22 48 Research in the ORKAD research team at CRIStAL Office: ESPRIT S3.05 Tel: +33  3 28 77 85 78 Since September 2020, I am "MaÃ®tre de confÃ©rences" (associate professor) at UniversitÃ© de Lille in Lille, France. I am teaching computer science at IUT de Lille. I do my research as a member of the ORKAD research team in CRIStAL. My research interests are: Algorithms, reductions, graph theory, parameterized complexity, diversity, multi-objective optimization Publications Events Publications A Hybrid Genetic approach for Bi-level Flexible Job Shops arising from selective deconstruction Corentin Juvigny, Julien Baste, Guillaume Lozenguez, Arnaud Doniec, and Laetitia Jourdan Short version to appear in IEEE 2023 Congress on Evolutionary Computation (CEC), 2023.
